message: Starting trace of reviewer spawn failure. Reading real_mcp_server.py to trace the call chain from update_agent_progress() to _auto_spawn_phase_reviewers()
Traced call chain. Now analyzing the critical phase status check at line 5262 and why reviewers fail to spawn. Need to check the MIGRATION FIX comment that disables registry writes.
Traced full call chain. Confirmed root cause: MIGRATION FIX at lines 3614-3617 blocks registry write, causing phase status check to fail at line 5262. Now documenting final analysis.

MISSION COMPLETE: Traced exact code path where reviewers fail to spawn. ROOT CAUSE: _maybe_auto_submit_phase_for_review() sets phase status to 'AWAITING_REVIEW' in memory at line 3599, but the registry write is COMMENTED OUT at lines 3614-3617 due to 'MIGRATION FIX'. When _auto_spawn_phase_reviewers() reads the registry from disk at line 5254, phase status is still 'ACTIVE', causing the check at line 5262 to fail and return an error at line 5263 BEFORE any agents spawn. Documented complete call chain with file:line citations, answered all 4 specific questions from mission.
